description:
The icebreaker 200 Sonebula Long Sleeve High Neck is a base layer top that is made of 100% merino wool, a natural fiber that has many benefits for outdoor activities.

  • Merino wool is warm, breathable, moisture-wicking, odor-resistant, and biodegradable
  • It has a high collar that protects the neck from the cold and wind, and raglan sleeves that allow for easy movement
name: icebreaker 200 Sonebula Long Sleeve High Neck - Women's
